description: Caffeine promotes intracellular calcium release by activating ryanodine receptors on the sarcoplasmic reticulum of skeletal and smooth muscle, enhancing muscle contraction.  Inspired by [Figure 1 in Kumar and Lipshultz, 2019](https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC6915633).
title: Caffeine in myocytes
